a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Burden of disease, by age group, World
Disability-Adjusted Life Year (DALYs) from all causes per 100,000 individuals, by age group.
DALYs measure the total burden of disease â€“ both from years of life lost due to premature death and years lived
with a disability. One DALY equals one lost year of healthy life.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
